values:
this was defiantly the best birthday .. EVER!!

i went out to eat with the family blah blah who cares about that shit. around 5ish me and aymee left for philly for the dashboard concert and it was so fucking awesome!!!

finally when dashboard came on i was so excited it freaking took forever but it was well worth the wait. after a couple songs Chris said he had a special annoucement to make. He said "Today is Meg Ryan's birthday and i would like to say a special happy birthday to you, come up on stage" so me and Aymee were freaking out and we went up on stage and he sang me a song as he held me in his muscular arms! it was the most amazing thing in the world. and we got to hang out with them after the concert and shit.

 

^ hahahahahahahaha yeah right i fucking wish ^

but seriously though the concert was really awesome and it was a really great birthday. and thank you thank you thank you aymee for getting me the tickets because it was fucking AWESOME!!!!

when i was down you came to me and promised to always be by my side now youre gone and i'm waiting patiently- sometimes it seems youre not with me it hurts me so much - it hurts me so much- i miss aymee.. i miss everything.. and i don't get it. i don't even understand what happened.. maybe i did something - i usually do.. yeah it's probably all my fault. i find ways to fuck up everything but then i can never find ways to fix it. i hate crying. it doesn't solve anything. i just wanna rewind. to before-to the day where we layed in the hammack and when we came inside and took soo many pictures. then she got them developed and we looked at them and ate Rita's and went to target. and we bought shoes together. then we sat outside and talked on the phone right next to each other and laughed so incredibly loud that the people that worked there came out to see what we were doing. and then the next day we wore our shoes...i think. why can't we be so-in-love anymore? what happened? what changed? why? if we both want it back well then why isn't it back? how do you get it back? what do you have to do? where's my best friend? it hurts. everything hurts. why? WHY? i don't understand anything. i just don't fucking get it. i don't get it.. i wanted to talk to her so badly yesterday. i wanted to jump on her a give her a big hug and tell her how much i missed her. but i didn't. i didn't know how she would respond. i didn't want to be the only one excited to be with eachother. so i just held it in. and i wanted to talk. about everything. like we used to. but we hardly talked at all. and it kind of upset me. cause i want to be able to talk about anything with her again. but i don't know what to say. i don't want to upset her by talking about something that she doesn't want to talk about. tomorrow--tomorrow everything will be fine. right?!

summer. i don't really feel like explaining every day of summer so far ...but i will cause i'm bored and waiting for my food to get done. thursday-*last day of school! slept over janines with aymee & charlene. friday-*walked to massos (mmm!) went swimming, layed out, came home and tanned with aymilicious. set up horseshoes (scaryy) swam over brittney's at night-LOST MY SHOES!! OH NO saturday-*tanned, kyle came over, went to jordan's party with kyle and aymee. good times. then a not so good time. but i'm just gonna try to forget about it then maybe that'll make the problems go away cause nothing else has worked so far. sunday-*hung out with jon. went out to eat with the family. went over nick's. came home around 1 monday-*went down the shore with kyle and pat. soo much fuN! i wanted to invite aymee but we didn't decide to go until late sunday night and i didn't want to be annoying and call her house at late hours and wake up her mom cause that's not cool. plus i wasn't sure if she was home anyways..mighta stayed at her daddys but i dunno so today's tuesday which means there 3 more days til MY BIRTHDAY / DASHBOARD CONCERT for my birthday i'm going out to eat with my family and aymee (if she wants to come) then GOING TO THE DASHBOARD CONCERT WITH AYMEEEEEE!! hELLLLL YEAAHH. this could possibly be my best birthday, EVERRRR!

wow...

friday-* i had a party. i did not have a good time. it sucked and im never having a party again. if other people had fun then thats great just never at my house again!

saturday-* mike's party. oh jeez. me and aymee went to the basement drank some beers with jenn. jenn is awesome. made fun of people. then after awhile mike ran outta beer so he kept on giving me gin and a lot of it. and i didn't feel so good. then me and aymee saw steph and mark and i don't really remember going into the bathroom but i guess we did. then somehow we were outside. i remember sitting in a circle and im not sure who was in the circle and then i don't remember anything else. but people told me what happened. and...im sorry. the next thing i remember is im in the bathroom again. then im outside. then im inside again and a cop comes in. oh shit. there was a sober driver and he could take 5 people so we pretended he was gonna drive us. but we just hid in the bushs cause i didn't want to leave aymee. i didn't know what was happening to her or where she was. we hid there for a long time until someone told me that she wasn't in the house anymore. then we went to my house and were locked out for 4 hours. wonderful...

sunday -* defiantly time for a chill day haha. food shopping. horse shoes over aymee. i defiantely tore that shit up hahaha. we watched Now and Then. i haven't seen that in so long. good shit.

today i feel soooo sick. i've been blowing my nose all night long. and i tried to go to sleep but a certain pissy pants called and wouldn't let me sleep! haha.

peace peace lil kiddies.
love.love<3

today sucked-
.mondays suck
.extremely tired
.got 3 administrative detentions
.my mom knows i have a detention tomorrow, she doesn't know why, or how many.

but on a good note,
THE WOMAN IS LEAVING TOMORROW MORNING!!!!!!!! :D

this one goes out to daniel.
i bet you that you'll notice that i updated again within about 5 minutes of me updating this. cause you stalk my journal and check it every minute to see if i updated yet. cause im a mothafuckin p-i-m-p.

dan is a weird kid. he's addicted to cereal and longs for some sweet loving from a nice woman friend. although, he pretends that he gave up on searching. we all know his quest is on-going. he makes hemp bracelets like a mad man. what a nice kid. for some reason he sucks at burning me cds when he says he will. like he said he would burn me the new senses fail cd. but i have yet to receive it. i didn't even ask for it. he just said he would burn it for me BUT HE DIDN'T!! but it's okay cause he's a busy man with all his hemp making and whatnot. he almost got pantsed today. doesn't that stink?! HAAA!!! love you danny!!!

yesterday was very cool. i went to 1st period, took a test. went to 2nd period, had a sub: did nothing all period. after that meghan sweeney and myself left school. we hopped into a car and speed off! hahaha. we went to genardis and harrassed the foods and fruits and whatnot. then we went back to my house and chillaxed. then we went out for lunch then to kmart for some wonderful size 4263576956 bathing suits. soo many hilarious pictures i wish everyone could see but theyre on meghans camera. then we went to shop rite. i saw dave demarco. then we took meghan home. then he took me home. i took a nap. went over aymees. she blazed. i watched. went to mcdonalds -> ew. aymee took a LONG ass nap. i sat there. we rented movies. watched gothika -> pretty scary. she watched radio. i slept. now i can't go back to sleep. aymilicious is at work. i decided that i don't want to work. why work when i don't HAVE to? i'll just wait til i desperiatly need to work. cause working SUCKS. 3 days - - > mom will be in florida. i was thinking about having a party. but i think i'll just have some friends over. nothing too big. cause last time the cops came. i don't need that shit haha. i can't wait til she leaves.

IT'S OFFICAL THAT MEGHAN LOVES AYMEE MORE!!!!!

this is cool kid, aymee. she's saying "WHAT BITCH?!" actually she's not really saying that but i would like to think that she is.

today me and amyee made a book for child development. aymee's in love with me.  we like to pretend that we were friend since we were little but that's a lie. but if we were friends when we were little that would be kick ass. you know why? cause we're kick ass mothafuckaaa!!

hey just got home. yesterday was pretty fun. jess came over and we ate some dinner mmmm .. then aymee came over. we went to janines house and me jess aymee janine charlene katey and lyndsie walked to applebees. i saw my dad when we were walking by, it was pretty cool. i wasn't even hungry but i couldn't stop eating. those boneless chicken wings are SO fucking good. then jess had to go home :(  and ian and tj came to pick the rest of us up. we went back to daves house to chill drink some beers and watch the fight. so that was cool ya know we were just sitting there chillen, drinkin, watchin the fight and as SOON as the main fight was about to start, the power went off! WHAT THE HELL!!!! and immediatly as the power went off this kid grabbed aymee and tried to get with her. she went with the NO NO NO method. and he kept talking to her all night and became like obsessed with her. she was really weirded out by him. well some people left and then it was getting late and there was nothing to do and still no power. so we were gonna walk to the lake and go swimming. immediatly as we left the house, the power went back on. it was real weird. so me aymee janine charlene marlo josh chip dave and brian went to the lake and i didn't wanna go swimming but eventually i did and i lost my fucking thumb ring! so we went back to daves house and watched How High. me and aymee were laying together talking and laughing a lot. i really liked it. i like it when we just laugh about everything. it's really nice. josh kept rubbing my feet and my legs and holding my hand and stuff. i didn't want to leave aymee alone cause brian kept asking if he could lay with us but obviously there was no room. so i just sat up and watched the movie. most people fell asleep. i went to bed around 6-6:30 and we left around 7 so that was cool i got tons of sleep.. ha..
alright dawgs i don't even know why i wrote out almost every single thing that happened. i'm just bored like that. awesome. sleepy timee!!!

wow i don't think i've updated all week. kinda busy i guess..

well on wednesday in english we had to watch Antigone so i wrote danielle a note that i miss her and she said wanna hang out friday or saturday and i said yeah let's hang friday and she said okay wanna go to the movie with me angee kris and the girls and i said yeah sounds like fun.

yesterday my dad came home and got mad at me? so he wouldn't take me. so kyklebutt drove me cause he loves me. and then i saw JESS and i JUMPEDDD on her and she actually caught me and held me up man i was soo happy to see her. i know i see her everyday in school but i havent hung with her since like my party i think. yaaaa i can't wait til tonight!! so anyways then me danielle angee jasmine kris and lauren saw mean girls. then after we were gonna go to some college party but we didn't. i didn't really wanna go haha. i felt like i didn't belong. i feel like i don't know danielle anymore. the way she talked with angee and did't talk to me at all reminded me of the way she used to talk to me and ignore everyone else. i almost cried in the car. cause they were talking and laughing having a good time reminising and i was just sitting in the back looking out the window thinking and holding back tears. i thought about last year. i thought about the summer. i missed danielle even though she was sitting right in front of me. hanging out with her isn't going to make me stop missing her. because when i hang out with her angee has to be there and i can't hang out with the old danielle. the danielle that used to put me before everything. she's never coming back. danielle and i will never be close like we used to man. man when we were best friends i don't even remember one time when i was sad. except for the time when she got with manny. then i got sad. then she stopped being my best friend. then my saddness never stopped.

i don't belong. i don't fit. i've tried to hang out with a bunch of different groups of people and i don't fit in with any of them. i'm not accepted. and it's hard. it's real hard. and no one understands. i just want to start over. i suck at life. maybe if i get another try i can change and be different and i can be good at it. but that'll never happen. and i'll always suck.

some reason i have a feeling that aymee got with ray last night. i'm not sure so i'm gonna wait til she tells me. if she does tell me. i don't know. i know she still likes him and he still likes her and all that. but i don't think it's a good idea if they keep getting with each other. because now there's nothing stopping him from getting with other girls but i know aymee wouldn't get with another guy. she's not like that she just woudldn't be able to do that. and i don't want her to get hurt again. 

i'm gonna go outside and listen to music and think.

yesterday i went to brooklyn for my cousins communion party. it was nice. except for before we left my dad and my brother were flipping some major shit on me i have no idea why and i cried the way there cause i can't handle being yelled at and having people mad at me. i think that i work around other people's emotions. i never really express my own emotions. i don't know what i'm trying to say. well anyways me and kyle had some rum and coke and then some beers then some seven and sevens. me and my favorite aunt lori were happily drunk together. i have pics i might post them if i remember. it was actually a lot of fun. i hate my dad. i hate him alot. i don't know if i can forgive him. i don't really want to talk about it and i don't think that i'm gonna discuss this with anyone. just gotta get it out somehow. i'm really really upset with him. i don't want to talk to him. i don't even want to go near him. gotta go meet aym at the park we needa talk much love<3 * i just got back from talking with aymee. the real reason that ray broke up with her was not what he told her. and that made her pissed. i feel real bad cause she doesn't deserve any of this. i don't want her to think that it's her fault but i guess it's hard thinking that it's not your fault when the same exact thing happens every time. believe me, i know what it's like. also, she told me that mark never even liked me haha. thats kinda funny cause every guy that i got with didn't actually like me. i dunno i guess it's just something about me? what can ya do kinda sucks but guys aren't the most important thing so i'm not worried. so then i told her about my little situation. i guess she didn't know what to say. i mean if we switched places and she was the one telling me i wouldn't know what to say either. when i got home i talked to pat on the phone and he told me that he thought the same thing to. but i told him that he doesn't understand it's for real this time and he said just ignore it that's what he does just don't think about it. alright well im out again, bitches. lovelove<3

yesterday was pretty good. came home from school and YA KNOW with aymee and it was fucking awesome. we ate SO much and then she passed out and she went home and ya know again but i didn't. so we were gonna go over adrianas and chill with her and jenn and then they were all like no don't come over at the LAST minute as we were leaving my house. so jon picked us up and we went somewheres i don't know and i didn't talk to him because i was fucking mad at him. i just talked to his friend instead cause he's a dickhole. so here's what happened: i was reading through his text messages cause theyre all from me anyways. but there was one that he sent to someone and it said "god i fucking hate jesus [[he calls me jesus-why?-i dont know]] shes such a douche bag she told me to call her then got off before i could say anything and then she said that i piss her off whenever we talk and she got mad and hung up" and then she said to him "she like to play too many games you should just be pissed at her thatll get her mad"  ..what the fuck?! why the hell does he gotta fucking talk shit behind my back? if i really upset him that much he should have come to me and said something not talk about me. i was real pissed so i just stopped talking to him. then he got pissed but i dont give a shit. that's not what friends fucking do. fuck him.

today was alright. this morning i was NOT about to wake up. soo i didn't. then eventually i HAD to get up and get ready. school sucked. like usual. i stole jon's sweatshirt and i'm definetly never giving it back and it was cold today so i wore it and he had to wear this fag-ass looking sweatshirt and i said "haha you look like a douche bag" okay. so. my chem grade dropped A LOT since last week. a 97 to a 78. yeah go me.. merv came home on our bus today and sat with me. i came home cause me and kyle were supposed to go to the gym. but he said he had allergies and went to play video games and smoke instead. so me and aymee went to the park and walked around. then we took and nap and watched the lil kid JEOPARDY! man that was funny! then she had to be a fagass and leave me and i got sad and wouldn't let her go. it was a good time. spending some good quality laughable time with aymee can make any bad day good.

 

i made a special smiley for dan because they didnt have any for him - - >  YAY!!!!

today was fun! well school was school ya know usual boring shit. then after school shaun took me and christy to the cherry hill mall. man what a freaking fun time. it was so damn funny! then shaun the fag went tanning (just kidding-love you) we had quite an intresting ride hahaha. yeah they know what im talking about ; )  hahah yup so anyways now i'm home and bored so i'm gonna go and do somethinggg!

<3love you

stephanie jamie lauren tasha lauren me

jamie & franny, steph & brian, lauren & matt, tasha & adam, lauren & jeff, me & jon

this weekend wasn't really fun. ..well it was kinda fun but mostely it wasn't. friday was prom. i felt out of place cause i didn't know any of the guys and i wasn't friends with any of the girls so when we were doing the whole picture deal and what not i had no one to talk to. the limo was awesome tho. once i got there i was like fuck this and i hung out with MY friends not his..fuck them. so then it was kinda fun. cotillion was wayy better tho. anyways then we left early to go to rays house. i still didn't know anyone there so i kinda just sat by myself all night...cool. then saturday we went out to eat then we went home and took showers and went down the shore. we made fun of people and ate .. good times. jon taught me how to drive a stick shift and i'm a pro! haha. driving home i was laughing SO hard that my face hurt and i could not stop laughing then my face went numb it was kinda scary haha. then i had to go into serious mode cause aymee called me to tell me about how rays an ass. then i came home went over aymees and took a nap. then we went to bridgets house. i didn't really wanna go there in the first place but i just went cause aymee wanted to go. soo .. it was real beat. no fun. at all. then we went back in the woods..ya know. and then aymee left with ray so i was gonna go find her i wanted to tell her about what the little annoying girls did but then i was like nevermind..ill leave them alone..sooo i walked up and down the street by myself for a long while. then finally my dad came. soo for some reason that all equals out to aymee being mad at me? i don't see what i did but i guess i did something wrong..like usual. cause i can never do anything right it seems. but i was talking to mac when i got home and he seemed real concerned and wanted to help and he actually did make me feel better.

kyle and pat were real drunk. they were taking turn talking to me. it was cute. i miss them.

well tonight was awesome. went to mr. eastern with my love, aymee. i kept calling her a douche bag all night and i think she was getting mad but IM SORRY cause i love you, my little douche bag (just kidding) and then it got boring and i was just sitting there not listening cause they were having technical difficulties and so i was just sitting and thinking and whenever i do that it equals=no good. so then i called my dad to come get us when it was over and he was like "you didn't get a ride?!" like all mad or whatever but he when we were leaving he said "okay call me when it's over to come pick you up." so WTF?! and then it was cold outside and my little douche bag wanted me to hold her but i was too cold to open up my arms. and we had a boobie grabbing war. i most defintly won! and then since i wasn't in a good mood cause ya know im a stupid ass and always think about shit and get upset my dad was fucking pissing me off SO much and he NEVER shuts the fuck up like when i'm not in a good mood aymee just gets quiet til i'm over it in a couple minutes then everything's fine. cause she knows how i works and she doesn't wanna piss me off. but my dad's a fucking asshole and just pushs me and pushs me. he is SO annoying sometimes. he thinks he's so fucking cool but it's just so annoying sometimes i just wish he would shut the fuck up when i tell him to instead of talking and being obnoxious even more.
